Class MementoStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.kazocsaba.memento.MementoStore

  • public class MementoStore
extends Object
    Static functions for saving and loading mementos.

    • Method Detail

      • mementoToBinaryFile

        public static void mementoToBinaryFile(Memento memento,
                       Path file)
                                throws IOException
        Writes a memento to a file in binary format. Mementos written with this function can be read using binaryFileToMemento(Path).
        Parameters:
        memento - a memento
        file - the file in which to write the memento
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • binaryFileToMemento

        public static Memento binaryFileToMemento(Path file)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          MementoFormatException
        Reads a memento from a binary file. This function expects a file created using mementoToBinaryFile(Memento, Path).
        Parameters:
        file - the file to read from
        Returns:
        the memento
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        MementoFormatException - if the format of the file is incorrect

      • mementoToBinary

        public static void mementoToBinary(Memento memento,
                   OutputStream out)
                            throws IOException
        Writes a memento to a stream in binary format. The data written this way can be safely read using binaryToMemento(InputStream), even if additional data is appended to the stream after the memento.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento
        out - the stream to write to
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • binaryToMemento

        public static Memento binaryToMemento(InputStream in)
                               throws IOException,
                                      MementoFormatException
        Reads a memento to a stream in binary format. This function expects data written using mementoToBinary(Memento, OutputStream) and reads the exact same number of bytes as mementoToBinary wrote.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to read from
        Returns:
        the memento
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        MementoFormatException - if the format of the data is incorrect

      • mementoToXml

        public static Document mementoToXml(Memento memento)
        Creates an XML document defining a memento.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento to write
        Returns:
        the XML document storing the memento

      • mementoToXmlStream

        public static void mementoToXmlStream(Memento memento,
                      OutputStream out)
                               throws IOException
        Writes a memento to a stream in XML format.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento to write
        out - the stream to write to
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • mementoToXmlFile

        public static void mementoToXmlFile(Memento memento,
                    Path file)
                             throws IOException
        Writes a memento to a file in XML format.
        Parameters:
        memento - the memento to write
        file - the file to write to
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • xmlToMemento

        public static Memento xmlToMemento(Document doc)
                            throws MementoFormatException
        Reads a memento from an XML document.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document storing the memento
        Returns:
        the memento
        Throws:
        MementoFormatException - if the format of the document is incorrect
